explanation: [0-0] A man in a white T-shirt is sitting at a gray table, looking up with his head raised. He's holding a water bottle to his mouth with both hands. There's a black earphone on the table, and the background is dark gray.

[0-4] The man in white puts down the water bottle, and the scene switches to a split-screen. The upper half shows the man wearing black earphones, putting his hands down and looking ahead. The lower half introduces a new scene: a man in a black long-sleeved shirt standing in a bamboo forest, looking at the camera. He then bumps into a bamboo stalk, grabbing it with both hands and leaning back, his wig falling to the ground. The camera then zooms in on his frowning face.

[4-8] The upper half of the split-screen remains the same with the man in white looking ahead. The lower half switches to a woman in black clothing standing in a room, a green parrot perched on her chest. She claps her hands, the parrot disappears, and she turns to the right. The lower half then changes to a picture of a green parrot against a background of white clouds.

[8-17] The lower half of the screen switches again, showing a pair of hands putting on white socks. Halfway through, the socks are pulled over the heels and then the toes, shaping them into shoes. The image pauses on the foot wearing the sock-shoes, the texture of the socks clearly visible. At the same time, the man in white in the upper half spits out water and collapses on the table, while a hand in the lower half gives a thumbs up.
